affymetrix.calvin.data
Class DataGroup

java.lang.Object
  affymetrix.calvin.data.DataGroup

public class DataGroup
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to get a DataSet in a DataGroup.

getDataSet

public DataSet getDataSet(int dataSetIdx)
                   throws DataSetNotFoundException
Returns a pointer to the DataSet object by DataSet index. Each call will return a new DataSet object. The caller should call Delete when finished with the DataSet.

Parameters:
dataSetIdx - The index of the DataSet to return.
Returns:
DataSet
Throws:
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException - DataSet not found.
DataSetNotFoundException

getDataSet

public DataSet getDataSet(java.lang.String dataSetName)
                   throws DataSetNotFoundException
Returns a pointer to the DataSet object by DataSet name. Each call will return a new DataSet object. The caller should call Delete when finished with the DataSet.

Parameters:
dataSetName - The name of the DataSet to return.
Returns:
DataSet
Throws:
affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException - DataSet not found.
DataSetNotFoundException
